vulnerabilities.title: MooTools Regular Expression Denial of Service
vulnerabilities.description: MooTools is a collection of JavaScript utilities for JavaScript developers. All known versions include a CSS selector parser that is vulnerable to Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS). An attack requires that an attacker can inject a string into a CSS selector at runtime, which is quite common with e.g. jQuery CSS selectors. No patches are available for this issue.

vulnerabilities.title: Prototype Pollution in mootools
vulnerabilities.description: This affects all versions of package mootools. This is due to the ability to pass untrusted input to Object.merge()
